Beginning Portuguese I.Description: Introduction to the four skills (listening, speaking, reading, writing) of elementary Portuguese.

TechnicalAndDigitalSkills: Proficiency in basic Portuguese language skills
Listening and comprehension of spoken Portuguese
Application of digital tools for language learning
Understanding foundational Portuguese grammar and vocabulary
InterpersonalAndCommunicationSkills: Engaging in conversations using basic vocabulary
Building confidence in verbal and written exchanges
Facilitating discussions on cultural topics in Portuguese
ProblemSolvingAndAnalyticalSkills: Applying problem-solving techniques in language acquisition
Analyzing sentence structures and grammatical rules
Developing strategies to enhance language retention
Interpreting written and spoken texts for meaning
OrganizationalAndLeadershipSkills: Organizing personal study schedules for language practice
Leading small group exercises in language classes
Planning and participating in cultural immersion activities
Managing time effectively in coursework and assignments
Encouraging peer collaboration in language projects
